programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Focusing on the relationships between animals and people living in some of the worlds most extraordinary natural wonders, this episode follows nomadic people from the Yamal Peninsula in northern Siberia, as they hunt one of the very few animals that can survive in this frozen environment, reindeer. Elsewhere, cameras observe a local ranger in the coastal salt marshes of Northern Australias Arnhem Land, as he goes in search of the eggs of one of the worlds most aggressive predators, the saltwater crocodile

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: Bendor Grosvenor and Emma Dabiri visit Brighton Museum to investigate who painted two neglected pictures of religious subjects. Plus, Emma investigates how Brightons Royal Pavilion ended up an empty shell, ransacked and sold to the local council

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson presents as Frank Muir, Kate OMara, Godfrey Smith compete against Arthur Marshall, Victoria Wood and Tim Brooke-Taylor to earn points by identifying the correct definitions of obscure words. First broadcast in 1982

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against Patricia Owen, Brian Redhead and John Julius Norwich. With guest musician James Galway. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Black and White in Colour: Television, Memory, Race, 1936-68
programme.desc: First of a two-part documentary, first broadcast in 1992, that explores the contribution made by black and Asian people to British television between 1936 and 1968. Combining archive clips with stories of performers like Carmen Munroe and Cy Grant to ask if images on TV since have been portrayal or betrayal

programme.title: Black and White in Colour: Television, Memory, Race, 1936-68
programme.sub-title: Black and White in Colour: Television, Memory, Race, 1968-92
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part documentary tracing and questioning the progress made by black and Asian people on British television. Sitcoms such as Till Death Us Do Part gave work to black actors, but were audiences laughing with them or at them? First broadcast in 1992

programme.title: The Riviera: A History in Pictures
programme.desc: Richard E Grant concludes his exploration of the French Rivieras artistic legacy by focusing on how art and celebrity became intertwined in the early part of the 20th century. Resident artists such as Picasso and Matisse found the sun-drenched landscape ideal for experimenting with their work, and as the region became a creative hub, the likes of novelist Jean Cocteau and ballet impresario Sergei Diaghilev were drawn to the area. This artistic community also liked to party on the Cote dAzurs beaches - a pastime that proved equally irresistible to the American multimillionaires arriving in the area on board transatlantic liners

programme.title: An Art Lovers Guide
programme.desc: Janina Ramirez and Alastair Sooke explore the capital of Azerbaijan, which offers a mix of the ancient and modern in a country where cultural life is tightly controlled

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: Bendor Grosvenor and Emma Dabiri visit Brighton Museum to investigate who painted two neglected pictures of religious subjects. Plus, Emma investigates how Brightons Royal Pavilion ended up an empty shell, ransacked and sold to the local council

programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Focusing on the relationships between animals and people living in some of the worlds most extraordinary natural wonders, this episode follows nomadic people from the Yamal Peninsula in northern Siberia, as they hunt one of the very few animals that can survive in this frozen environment, reindeer. Elsewhere, cameras observe a local ranger in the coastal salt marshes of Northern Australias Arnhem Land, as he goes in search of the eggs of one of the worlds most aggressive predators, the saltwater crocodile

programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the Kamayura People, who reside in Brazils Xingu Indigenous Park. For the Kamayura, pleasing the spirits is crucial to maintaining good health, and during one key festival, a warrior must dance for hours to appease a bird spirit, sustained only by food and drink brought to him by villagers. In Ethiopia, belief drives the residents of the Tigray region to climb a 400-metre mountain to reach their church. In Switzerland, the Zermatt air rescue team offers an insight into why millions of hikers, climbers and skiers visit the Swiss Alps every year, despite the risk of injury - or even death

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom learns Margo has been keeping appointments at a mysterious address and immediately leaps to the conclusion that she is having an affair - but doesnt know how to break the news to Jerry. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Penelope Keith

programme.title: Yes Minister
programme.desc: Hacker courageously puts his ministerial career in the balance by deciding to inform the prime minister of British arms sales to Italian terrorists. Sir Humphrey launches a frantic damage-limitation exercise to ensure vested interests arent compromised. Political comedy, with Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Oh, Doctor Beeching!
programme.desc: Harry the signalman has fattened up a lovely turkey in time for Christmas, but the turkey seems to have other plans. Comedy, starring Su Pollard. First broadcast 8 July 1996

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In an attempt to leave the men free for front-line fighting, Mainwaring and Wilson decide to recruit women into the platoon to take care of the more tedious tasks such as polishing brass. However, the captain loses his heart to an attractive widow, and it is not long before gossip spreads. Comedy first broadcast in 1970, starring Arthur Lowe and John Le Mesurier, with a guest appearance by Carmen Silvera

programme.title: The Signalman
programme.desc: Denholm Elliott stars in this adaptation of Charles Dickens ghost story about a lonely signalman haunted by a spectral figure who appears to bring a warning of impending danger

programme.title: Murder on the Victorian Railway
programme.desc: Drama-documentary examining the death of banker Thomas Briggs in July 1864, which was the first murder to be committed on a British train. The film uses testimonies from court transcripts, memoirs, letters and newspaper reports to tell the story of the crime through those connected to it, including engine driver Alfred Ekin - who found the body - and Richard Tanner, the detective in charge of the investigation. It also explores the huge public outcry and debate it provoked. Narrated by Toby Jones

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.sub-title: The Joy of (Train) Sets: The Model Railway Story
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the popularity of train replicas, and how what started out as an adult obsession with building fully engineered model railways became the iconic toy of 1950s and 1960s childhood. With contributions from modellers such as Pete Waterman, this programme celebrates the joys of miniaturisation

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.sub-title: The Engine That Powers the World: Timeshift
programme.desc: Looking at the surprising story of the diesel engine - a 19th-century invention that is the hidden powerhouse behind the globalised world and is now indispensable. Car enthusiast Mark Evans gets hands on with Rudolf Diesels original creation, including vintage submarines, tractors, locomotive trains and container ships

programme.title: Murder on the Victorian Railway
programme.desc: Drama-documentary examining the death of banker Thomas Briggs in July 1864, which was the first murder to be committed on a British train. The film uses testimonies from court transcripts, memoirs, letters and newspaper reports to tell the story of the crime through those connected to it, including engine driver Alfred Ekin - who found the body - and Richard Tanner, the detective in charge of the investigation. It also explores the huge public outcry and debate it provoked. Narrated by Toby Jones

programme.title: Earths Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the Kamayura People, who reside in Brazils Xingu Indigenous Park. In Ethiopia, belief drives the residents of the Tigray region to climb a 400-metre mountain to reach their church. In Switzerland, the Zermatt air rescue team offers an insight into why millions of hikers, climbers and skiers visit the Swiss Alps every year, despite the risk of injury - or even death

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Helen Skelton present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: The Moment of Proof
programme.desc: DNA on a shoelace links a man to a series of violent attacks at music venues. Plus, police crack a case by finding coded information in a spreadsheet that leads to a hacker

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui Joseph visits Broadstairs, Kent, a favoured holiday destination of Charles Dickens to see a two-bedroom basement garden flat bought by an experienced developer. Martin Roberts is in Burton-on-Trent, Staffordshire, where he sees a fire-damaged two-bed mid-terrace he first saw back in 2021. Hes also in Tonypandy, south Wales, to visit a four-storey building with potential to convert into separate flats. All three properties are then sold at auction and the successful bidders share their ambitions for their new acquisitions

programme.title: Live Athletics: World Championships
programme.desc: Jeanette Kwakye presents further coverage of the second session on day three of the biennial event, held this year at Japan National Stadium in Tokyo. The mens pole vault final continues and the 110m hurdles heats get under way at 12.20. With analysis from Jessica Ennis-Hill and Jenny Meadows, and commentary by Steve Cram, Steve Backley, Andrew Cotter, Colin Jackson, Paula Radcliffe and Stef Reid

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, Tommy Walsh and Maxine Dwyer help Helen and Matthew, who are facing a huge maintenance bill, transform their cluttered flat into a stylish home

programme.title: Robson Greens Weekend Escapes
programme.desc: Star of the West End Joe McElderry joins Robson on a two-day trip into the wilds of Northumberland to relax the mind and recharge the body. The pair head first to a secluded lough to have a go at dragon paddle boarding, before heading to their farmland accommodation. Joe often holidayed on farms when he was younger, and he uses the skills he learnt as he and Robson have a go at trimming a prize-winning sheep

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Briony May Williams helps a couple with four kids relocate to North Yorkshire, and meets a couple who have turned their passion for bee-keeping into a buzzing new life

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Izzie Balmer and Saf Fakir clear a Chesterfield bungalow of quirky collectibles, including a life-size statue of Jesus, cuckoo clocks, an Egyptian sarcophagus and puppets hanging from the ceiling. Owners Paula and Neil desperately need to reclaim space as their family is about to expand. However, the gang lose track of time during a cuckoo clock fix

programme.title: The Answer Run
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the fast-paced quiz show in which three couples face a series of 50/50 questions that hurtle down the Answer Run towards them

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Stephen Mangan in the quiz in which contestants try to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious correct answers

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp present the first visit of the week to the One Show studio, featuring the usual mix of topical stories and celebrity chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Zoe is still shaken by the shooting, but the police insist it wasnt a targeted attack. The Slaters welcome her home but she finds it too overwhelming and rushes out. Tensions rise between Okie and Harry, and Georges suspicions are raised. Kim considers driving again, Julie reveals shes got a new job at Walford High and Alfie offers Zack the role of chef at the Vic

programme.title: Paula McIntyres Hamely Kitchen
programme.desc: The food writer heads to New England, where she meets Brad McFadden, whose ancestors come from the same townland where she grew up. After sharing a home-cooked meal made by Brad, Paula visits a family run distillery to sample the latest fruit-based liqueurs. Her final stop is Macks Apple Farm, which is famous for its apple cider donuts. At her cabin on the Maine shoreline, Paula cooks a mushroom-stuffed potato farl and an apple dumpling coated in hazelnut and cinnamon

programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: Trump and Starmer: A Special Relationship? - Panorama
programme.desc: On the eve of President Trumps unprecedented second state visit to Britain, Jane Corbin looks at the state of the historic special relationship between the US and the UK. She visits Scotland, home to the presidents golf courses and birthplace of his mother, speaks to foreign secretary David Lammy about the risks and rewards of dealing with Donald Trump, and assesses how the prime minister is handling his powerful and unpredictable guest

programme.title: The Guest
programme.desc: Fran offers Ria an exciting promotion, but doubts set in when unsettling revelations come to light that call her motives into question

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: True North
programme.sub-title: True North: My Stammer, My Story
programme.desc: This edition follows three young people as they discover ways to manage their stammers. Viewers are introduced to Courtney and Nathan, both in their twenties, who are taking part in an intensive, peer-led course designed by and for people who stammer. Also, 17-year-old Lily-Rose, who has lived with a stammer since she could speak, reflects on how it has shaped her friendships, education, and sense of self

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: Thirtysomething couple Jason and Nikki learn they will not be able to conceive a child together. When they learn that another round of IVF would be too expensive and unlikely to succeed, they start exploring adoption. Comedy drama, starring Rafe Spall and Esther Smith

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: Aware that the adoption agency will conduct background checks, Nikki and Jason set about presenting themselves in the best possible light and attempt to make sure their contacts and referees are on the same page

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: The time comes for one couple to flare out of Honeymoon Island, signalling the end of their relationship. On the other beaches, the couples swap partners for the day to gain some valuable insights into their marriages, resulting in some fiery exchanges on their return. Presented by Davina McCall

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: An intimacy crate washes up to help the honeymooners get personal, and when the couples spend the day apart at beach picnics, some are left reeling from shocking revelations - before a new couple jump into stranded life together. Presented by Davina McCall

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright, Karla Pryce, Asher Edwards and a team of helping hands come to the aid of Darren and Lydia, whose one-bedroom flat has been taken over by their hobbies of baking and biking, leaving no space to relax or entertain. The team come up with some innovative solutions to saving space

programme.title: Robson Greens Weekend Escapes
programme.desc: BMX world champion and Olympic silver medal-winner Kieran Reilly heads to Northumberland for a weekend to relax, reset and recharge with Robson Green. The host is keen to show Kieran how he switches off - by fishing in the River Tyne

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse helps a couple to find a new home closer to their son in Northumberland, and also pays a visit to the Northumberland National Park

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: James Broad and Lauren Wood visit a 300-year-old mill which has become a dumping ground for treasures and valuable heirlooms. The owners need to sell inherited items to fund the restoration of their home

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp present another mix of nationwide reports and live studio-based chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Zoes fears continue to grow, despite Kat and Anthonys best efforts to reassure her. Worried shes putting everyone in danger, Zoe packs her belongings - but Stacey pleads with her to stay. Ravi is set on putting George out of action, so Harry enlists Kojos help to convince him to take Phils offer of a boxing tour. Ross takes on a second job, leaving Vicki to take on more responsibilities with Joel

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.sub-title: The Less I Know About Joe, the Better
programme.desc: A glimpse into the daily lives of Stacey Solomon, Joe Swash and their five children. Stacey and Joe trade school runs for ski runs in a snowy family adventure, but Joes big romantic surprise quickly melts into laughter when it goes wrong

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.sub-title: The Great British Sewing Bee: The Final
programme.desc: Its sewing machines at the ready as the finalists tackle three challenges in their bid to be crowned this years winner. They begin by following the pattern for a deceptively simple bias-cut slip dress, where one mistake in cutting the fabric could cost them the chance to continue. In the transformation challenge, they make garments using sheer fabric, before finally tackling the art of trompe loeil, creating illusions with fabric to fit their chosen friend or family member. Three finalists, three challenges - but only one will be crowned as the latest champion. Presented by Sara Pascoe

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Red Eye
programme.desc: A hotel manager overcomes her fear of flying and boards a busy late-night flight to Miami, seating herself next to the seemingly friendly man she met in the airport. However, once the plane leaves the ground, she discovers her fellow passenger is a terrorist intent on involving her in an assassination plot. Wes Cravens suspense thriller, starring Rachel McAdams, Cillian Murphy and Brian Cox

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A crate containing the couples mobile phones washes ashore, revealing more than anyone bargained for. David drops a bombshell to Ini, causing shockwaves at the Couples Cove. And when night falls, a movie serves up some even bigger surprises for the honeymooners. Presented by Davina McCall

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Athletics: World Championships Highlights
programme.desc: Sarah Mulkerrins presents action from day three of the biennial event, held this year at Japan National Stadium in Tokyo. Reigning champion Armand Duplantis was among the athletes to watch as he looked to win yet another pole vault title, and Emile Cairess was aiming to become the first British man to win a world marathon medal

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Super-rich Roman politician Crassus raps about his blinging lifestyle, some unusual soldiers are recruited into the Second World War, and Johannes Gutenberg goes head to head with some monks on The Historical Apprentice

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May try to impress Oxford residents by building an electric car, and refuse to let an unenthusiastic response deter them from sitting in on the machines crash-test before handing it over to the Stigs environmentally friendly cousin. Actor Michael Sheen is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car, and Jeremy pits the Corvette ZR1 against the Audi R8 V10

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott discovers the dark side of Thailands backpacker culture. In the first episode, she lands in trouble with the Thai police when she starts to uncover the scale of Thailands illegal sex industry. A visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott meets men chasing cheap thrills in Asias sex capital, Pattaya, and also talks to a local sex worker, who reveals the harsh reality of working in the illegal sex industry. She then heads to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty. For Zara, this is paradise - but Lucio, a Brit who built a burgeoning cannabis business here while the drug was decriminalised, reveals that navigating the local law isnt always easy

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott experiences Ko Phangans famous Full Moon Party, but beneath the cheap cocktails, music and fire shows, theres danger lurking as the medical team treat a possible drink-spiking victim. She then travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle. But she also learns how dream holidays can quickly go wrong, hearing the case of a British holiday-maker who died on the island - and whose family is still searching for answers

programme.title: Bones and All
programme.desc: Teenager Maren learns from her absent father that she may have inherited her hunger for human flesh from the biological mother she has never known. Maren embarks on a quest to track down the missing matriarch and crosses paths with fellow eater Lee. Horror romance, starring Taylor Russell, Timothee Chalamet, Mark Rylance and Michael Stuhlbarg

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May try to impress Oxford residents by building an electric car, and refuse to let an unenthusiastic response deter them from sitting in on the machines crash-test before handing it over to the Stigs environmentally friendly cousin. Actor Michael Sheen is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car, and Jeremy pits the Corvette ZR1 against the Audi R8 V10

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Zara McDermott discovers the dark side of Thailands backpacker culture. In the first episode, she lands in trouble with the Thai police when she starts to uncover the scale of Thailands illegal sex industry. A visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law

programme.title: Laugh Lessons
programme.desc: Will examines how political polarity is turning people into politically righteous intolerant cantankerous killjoys - and ruining even the best of friendships

programme.title: Ibiza: Secrets of the Party Island
programme.desc: Zara McDermott gets a closer look at how social media is changing crime. Along with a police team from St Josep, she attends a robbery of a high end villa at knife-point

programme.title: Athletics: World Championships Highlights
programme.desc: Sarah Mulkerrins presents action from day four of the biennial event, held this year at Japan National Stadium in Tokyo. Americas Grant Holloway and Faith Kipyegon of Kenya were hoping to be in contention to defend their title in the 110m hurdles and womens 1500m respectively

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Monk St Augustine struggles to introduce Christianity to Saxon England, diarist Samuel Pepys annoys the smartest men in Britain, and Joan of Arcs story is told

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond debate which company has made the greatest number of exceptional vehicles, and James May finds a way of transporting caravans to campsites without inconveniencing other road users. The Top Gear track plays host to a replica of one of the worlds most famous rally cars, and broadcaster Chris Evans - some five years before he was announced as the shows new presenter - is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: Pilot for the military drama about 18-year-old Molly Dawes, who is desperate not to turn out like her mother - pregnant with her sixth child - and layabout father. So the morning after a hard drinking session, she walks into an Army recruitment office and tentatively asks about a job in the forces. The next thing she knows, she is on a two-day assessment course to find out whether she is a suitable candidate for basic training, and although she finds it hard to settle, the examiners see her as a rough diamond. But does she have enough potential to make it through? Lacey Turner stars, with Kerry Godliman, Matthew McNulty, Sean Gallagher, Dan Black and Katherine Pearce

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: Lacey Turner stars in this drama about an aimless young woman who finds a direction in life after joining the Army. Six months on from completing her initial training, Molly is deployed to Afghanistan as part of the Royal Army Medical Corps. She is thrilled to be joining the platoon for one of the last missions before the British Army withdraws from the country, but makes a bad first impression on the captain - and things only get worse when one of her fellow soldiers turns out to be a face from her past that she would rather forget (played by Game of Thrones and Misfits star Iwan Rheon). The cast also includes Ben Aldridge, Arinze Kene and Ade Oyefeso, with Kerry Godliman and Sean Gallagher as Mollys parents

programme.title: Bram Stokers Dracula
programme.desc: A 15th-century Transylvanian knight becomes a vampire after the death of his beloved wife. Centuries later, he learns she has been reincarnated, and travels to Victorian London with the intent of seducing her into joining him in living death. Francis Ford Coppolas Gothic horror based on the novel, starring Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins and Keanu Reeves

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond debate which company has made the greatest number of exceptional vehicles, and James May finds a way of transporting caravans to campsites without inconveniencing other road users. The Top Gear track plays host to a replica of one of the worlds most famous rally cars, and broadcaster Chris Evans - some five years before he was announced as the shows new presenter - is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: In Conversation
programme.desc: Rina Sawayama has been called the future of queer pop music. The Japanese-British singer speaks to the BBCs gender and identity correspondent Megha Mohan about her frustrations with the music industry, how her sexuality informs her art and growing up with racism in the UK. She also reveals, for the first time, the deeply personal and devastating inspiration behind her album

programme.title: We Built a Zoo
programme.desc: Documentary following 19-year-old TikTok star Kyle Thomas as he attempts to build a zoo for exotic species and separate himself from past controversy with animal rights activists. He enlists the help of farmer and builder Phil Hughes and together the pair plan on turning Phils modest petting farm into a world-class sanctuary for unwanted exotic animals

programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them. / Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because he’s convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is. / Chep has come across a new seedpod specimen. Mushpot warns him not to take it though. / Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: My Muddy Buddy/Mushlers To The Rescue/Shine, Lilit, Shine/Eyes On The Surprise
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a ‘friends tree’ mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. / Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and they’re loving it! / The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. / Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he won’t.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Eyes On The Surprise/The Show Mush Go On/Mushpots Treasure/Mush-Mush The Predictor/Whos Eating Mushton/The Breathtaking...
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he won’t. / Mushpie loves to sing. Only problem she is terrible at it! But Lilit, who has never heard her sing before, wants to make Mushpie happy and organizes a concert for her to sing. / When Mushpot wishes he could roll back the seasons and relive being a Mushler, our friends get him to hang out doing cool Mushler stuff. / Mush-Mush can’t figure out why his sense foot keeps buzzing like crazy… until an earthquake shakes the forest. Mush-Mush is sure he predicted it! / Everyone in Mushton is finding that their precious wooden things are being munched and destroyed by someone or something. / If Mush-Mush had Bolly’s speed, he’d want everyone to see just how awesomely fast he was.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Disappearing Mushler/Bouncing Back/Morel in the Dark/The Adventurers/Getting Truffy With It/Good Vibrations
programme.desc: Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone. / Mush-Mush invents a new game called Fruity Bounce. / When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp. / Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. / Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. / Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: ...Major/Bear Fractions/The Bear That Laid Golden Eggs/Crash Training Course/As Far as Bear Can Remember/Chemical Lemmings/Remote Control => As usual Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable but this time its impossible to enter! / The Lemmings have got hold of beans with strange properties. / Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano at any cost. / The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off an army convoy. / The Lemmings want to get their hands on a firework rocket. / Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear! / An old metal box found by chance in a recess of a cliff brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. / How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry with a fun experiment box? / Grizzys TV remote is stolen and stored high up in a tree.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Stuck In The Mud/Get The Egg Home/Fly, Chase, Fly/Oh My Compost/Snails Forever
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mush’s fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. / When an egg blows down into the village, it is Mush-Mush and friends’ mission to return it to Mush Mountain. / Chep is disappointed Mush-Mush and Lilit are too busy leaf-gliding to play moss-ball with him, so he hangs out with a new weevil friend instead. / When Sushi-Mushi breaks the only spoon he has ever cooked with, he declares his cooking days are over! / Chep wants to return a favour to Mush-Mush, but all Mush-Mush wants is to have a compost pancake on Pancake Day!

programme.desc: When Moley is given the key to the city, he has such a great day he convinces Manny to let him repeat the whole day! / Moley vows to not eat worms for a few days in support of Dotty’s veganism and his worm craving temptations get out of control. / When Moley spends the day with a young mole named Cheese who wants to be just like him, Moley helps Cheese recognize his own talents and uniqueness. / Mishmosh builds a tunnel digger, upsetting some that it will replace moles’ need to dig themselves. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! / Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger’s brand new and apparently burglar proof safe. / Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. / On a very hot day an ice cream commercial awakes the desire of Grizzy. / The Lemmings have discovered a truly wild new game: an augmented reality program on the rangers digital tablet. / The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment. / The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks.

And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton.

Parents, carers, and their little ones at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Giovanna has got a blue bib and blue sunglasses inside her bag. All the parents and babies have different blue toys and objects in their bags too, which are explored through play, songs and a story. Parents, carers, and their little ones at home are encouraged to hide a safe, baby-appropriate blue object or toy inside a fabric bag or pillowcase, and then play with the items together! The traditional nursery rhyme Little Boy Blue features, as does a story about Baby Bear and Baby Tiger dressing up in blue things, and viewers at home show how theyve been exploring the colour blue too. programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug lies to Carrie so he can ride the big dipper at an amusement park, but his deception backfires on him in ironic fashion. Meanwhile, Arthur adopts a novel approach to queue-jumping - persuading Deacon to push him around in a wheelchair

programme.desc: Rays close encounter with Debras new can opener leads to a colossal argument between the couple - in which Marie, Frank and Robert cannot help getting involved. American comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Peter Boyle

programme.desc: Frank shows an uncharacteristic interest in Rays work, but proves to have an ulterior motive. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Peter Boyle

programme.desc: Debra and Ray make their wills, but struggle to pick guardians for the children. They finally manage to decide - but not everyone is happy about the arrangement. Comedy, starring Ray Romano

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink is up for a prestigious title at his wine club and offers to host the next tasting in his apartment. Determined to get everything just right, he hires contractors to fix a scratch on the floor - then watches in horror as they wreck the place. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Part one of two. A miserly pay rise for staff prompts Frasier to cross swords with station manager Kate, but a meeting between the two sees them engage in more than negotiations as emotions are put to the test. Comedy, guest starring Mercedes Ruehl

programme.sub-title: The Adventures of Bad Boy and Dirty Girl

Comedy, guest starring Mercedes Ruehl, with Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Last Time I Saw Maris

programme.desc: YouTube star and internet sensation Bethany Mota goes undercover to meet up-and-coming social media hopefuls who are trying to break through. Disguised as an ordinary girl with a punk rock style who dreams of starting her own channel, Bethany meets a world champion beat-boxer, a pair of comical twin pranksters and an inspiring hip hop dance teacher. In the end, Bethany reveals her true identity in a surprising way and helps make their dreams come true

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Midday news summary

programme.title: Car S.O.S.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game, with Strictly Come Dancing head judge Shirley Ballas joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

The couple are veterans of the West End and Broadway and are looking for a holiday home in the sun which one day may become their permanent home for them and their beloved dog, Trinity. Jasmine shows them five options for their budget of £150,000

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Karen and Steve from Northamptonshire begin their mission to rescue a vast settlement with royal connections in southwest France. In Spain, Mother Nature wreaks havoc at Mikes mountainside village. And we rejoin Andrew and Katja who, after 16 years, are still battling to save their medieval Italian settlement

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at Redmire Village Pub in North Yorkshire, where hosts Kerrie and Vickie hope the cosy vibes and stunning countryside setting will be a hit

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Katie, the first host in Bolton, hopes to charm her guests with an evening of beauty revelations, cocktail-shaking and hearty homemade food, with local favourites on the menu

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, husband-and-wife team Steve and Sharon Garner help teaching duo Amanda and Paul find their perfect Spanish property, where they can enjoy their retirement. In the province of Alicante, darts enthusiast David and his wife Jane are hoping to hit the bullseye with a holiday home located close to bars and restaurants. On hand to help the duo find their dream property are sisters Sophie and Charlotte

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Jamie: Eat Yourself Healthy
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver showcases ingredients that are good for the heart, serving up a steak dinner and fish filo parcels with beans. He also prepares a green orecchiette pasta packed with broccoli and spinach, oaty fridge balls, and spicy tofu and sweet pepper eggs, as well as investigating the latest gut-health science

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: The latest request sends the players on a bear hunt. But what begins as a whimsical search quickly spirals into tension and suspicion, and just when the group think they know what to expect, a shocking twist upends everything. The Division Ceremony brings more revelations, which lead to an explosive row that threatens to tear the players apart

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Italian nice guy Matteos date is Sam, a 38-year-old marketing consultant, who pursues a rather intense line of questioning - with babies mentioned before theyve even ordered dinner. Hoping to turn over a new leaf in love is 28-year-old self-proclaimed tree-hugger Nathan. Entering the restaurant wearing a skirt, Nathan is on the hunt to find someone to share a life on the wild side. In walks 26-year-old Love, a fellow nature lover and Hare Krishna believer, whose spirituality has been a turn-off for dates in the past. A chef and a wedding singer are also among those hoping to meet their match

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: A year 10 student who plays for a youth rugby team harbours dreams of international professional stardom, but his ambitions are in jeopardy when Mr Burton threatens to call the head coach if his attitude doesnt improve. One of his classmates struggles with anxiety, especially when she falls out with a friend and faces being dropped down a set after a low score in a science test

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Jo Brand and Tom Allen are joined by guest Stephen Mangan to review memorable moments from Biscuit Week. They also catch up with the second baker to leave the tent, scrutinise the audience cakes and look at some viewers home baking pictures

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Greg Davies and Alex Horne welcome the latest five comics to take on the challenge - Maisie Adam, Reece Shearsmith, Sanjeev Bhaskar, Phil Ellis and Ania Magliano. Theyll be facing all manner of tasks, beginning with challenges involving codes, gym balls and disgusting noises, to test their daring, dexterity and dignity under pressure - and to also make them look just a little bit silly too

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: Comedy sketches, written by and starring David Mitchell and Robert Webb, featuring Hot Seat, the worlds shallowest new TV game show, the story behind the making of a 1970s pop classic, and a radio talk show host interviewing a very unusual xylophone player. Co-starring Kiell Smith-Bynoe, Lara Ricote, Stevie Martin and Krystal Evans

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Joe Lycett heads to the Austro-German border with his guest vacationer Roisin Conaty, spending a couple of days in the fairy-tale city of Salzburg. After checking in to the art-filled Blaue Ganz hotel, they hop into a horse and carriage for a tour of the city and an on-the-go three-course meal. They then embark on a forest-bathing workshop, attempting a series of exercises to reawaken their senses. Day two starts with a homage to Mozart. The duo reflect on the composers music then sample the citys signature sweet, Mozartkulgen - aka Mozart Balls - a mix of nougat, marzipan and dark chocolate

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay heads to Long Island, New York, to help an Indian restaurant which used to run a Mexican eatery out of the same kitchen. Its been operating for 35-years, but a decline in business led to fusion experiments, which havent always been successful and which have confused the customers. With some dishes tasting soggy and swimming with oil, Ramsay has his work cut out trying to turn things round

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.sub-title: Horse Box, Milk Float and Balancing Barn
programme.desc: The architect meets a woman who wants to build a shop and a mobile home out of an old horsebox on a budget of just £500, and a couple creating a holiday let from a 1960s milk float. He also visits a remarkable 100ft-long balancing barn and makes plans for a rectangular pod for his tree house in the grounds of Northumberlands Kielder National Park

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is upset by her hippie sisters decision to become a nun, and resolves to prove her new-found faith is just a phase. Comedy, starring Patricia Heaton

programme.desc: The psychiatrist suddenly realises he has a shortage of friends in Seattle, as most of his old ones are back in Boston. He announces on air he is looking for companionship and gets a lot more than he bargained for. Guest starring Griffin Dunne, with Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Joe spends the night in Daphnes room, causing a shocked Frasiers mind to work overtime and Niles to become consumed by jealousy. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star

In the end, Deion reveals his true identity to reward their generosity and help turn their dreams into reality

programme.desc: Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw travel to Scotland to take on a 1968 Lancia Fulvia - a 60s Italian automotive masterpiece. The car belongs to former hairdresser Bill, who bought the car back in 1984. It was his pride and joy until it went off the road a few years ago

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game, with Strictly Come Dancing head judge Shirley Ballas joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Channel 4 News

programme.desc: The bakers are hoping for a Hollywood handshake this week as they tackle bread, the steely-eyed judges speciality. For the showstopper, they serve up sweet bread in tiers. Sadly, for one baker, this will be their last day in the tent. Who will be dusting themselves off and hanging up their apron?

programme.title: The Inheritance
programme.desc: The players green fingers and sharp focus are put to the ultimate test in the Deceaseds dazzling mirrored gardens. But with another cut from the will looming, every decision feels weighted, and alliances fracture under the pressure . The threat of elimination drives whispers into strategies, and strategies into open rivalries, as the players calculate how to stay one step ahead

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: A look at what happened after Gordon Ramsay headed to Scottsdale, Arizona, where he met husband-and-wife bistro owners Samy and Amy Bouzaglo, who revealed a shocking contempt for customer feedback. programme.title: The Fear Clinic: Face Your Phobia
programme.desc: Ex-prison officer Paula is one tough cookie, but when it comes to spiders, she crumbles. Paula inherited her phobia from her mum and recalls being trapped in her bedroom for fear of a spider. Chloe has emetophobia - the phobia of people being sick - and talks about her sadness at not being able to care for her three young daughters. Chloes eldest daughter is already starting to show signs of the same phobia, after seeing Chloes reaction. Millys had a phobia of frogs for as long as she remembers. She wants to be treated for her phobia before her two young children inherit it too

Drama, starring Susan Sarandon, Sam Neill and Kate Winslet

programme.desc: Malis back and in the red, somethings changed for Bree, and Levi and Mackenzie think positive

programme.desc: James and Helen are keeping a secret, and following a visit to the Crabtrees Farm, Carmody is challenged with learning how to be a vet outside of his books. The new farmers have a worrying illness amongst their herd and James wants to help them in any way he can

programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: Motorway Cops: Catching Britains Speeders
programme.desc: Documentary following officers from Northumbria Police as they patrol 6,000 miles of roads in the north-east of England. An angry van driver gives a PC a dressing down despite the fact hes got no MOT or a full set of legal tyres, while another officer faces a suspected drug driver whose vocal boyfriend wont come quietly. Narrated by Nicky Campbell

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: Traffic Cops: Pursuit Squad One
programme.desc: Following the countrys highly trained police bikers, the UKs fastest responders who are always at the ready to race at top speed to save lives and catch suspects on the run. Near the end of a busy Bank Holiday weekend, biker cop Paul Buckley is called to a serious crash involving a car and motorbike in the North Yorkshire countryside. Tragically, the biker has died. Paul and colleagues begin piecing together how and why the collision occurred to work out if either the driver or rider could be to blame. Near York, after a disqualified driver fails to stop for police and goes off road and on the run, biker cop Paddy Green hunts down the runaway driver

programme.title: Fare Dodgers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: At Vauxhall, revenue protection officers from South Western Railway are involved in a major sting operation which prompts an investigation into fraud going back seven months. A lady is stopped using a half-price ticket bought with a Job Centre Plus discount card which she doesnt have. At Southampton, Spencer is on high alert after claims that two young women who push through the barriers are being abusive and are trying to travel for free. programme.title: Surgeons: A Matter of Life or Death
programme.desc: Dan, 37, faces one of the hardest waits of his life. Diagnosed with primary sclerosing cholangitis - a disease that is causing his bile ducts and liver to fail - his only chance of survival is a liver transplant. A potential donor has been found, and now the race is on to assess the livers viability. Once in surgery, Mr Bartlett works against the clock to quickly remove the old, diseased liver. But while trying to restore the blood supply to the new organ, theres a worrying lack of blood pressure

programme.title: Brunel: The Man Who Built Britain
programme.desc: Rob Bell tells the story of Isambard Kingdom Brunels two masterpieces of ship design - the SS Great Britain, the great-great-grandmother of all modern ships, and the SS Great Eastern. By the time he had finalised the latters design, the ship was 692ft long and weighed nearly 19,000 tons. The biggest vessel afloat of its era, it dominated the final years of Brunels life, generating great controversy at the time. It has even been blamed for causing his death

Krissy returns to the dating scene for the first time after becoming a first-time mum at age 51 and ends up paired with chauffeur-to-the-stars, Rob. British Sign Language user Shaun is hoping his Mr Bean impression will impress party-loving Carly and Retail assistant Neil roller-skates into the restaurant looking for someone who accepts him just the way he is

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Apu becomes the proud father of octuplets and enjoys being showered with free gifts from companies that want him to endorse their products - until a couple in nearby Shelbyville go one better by having nine children. Cartoon capers, featuring the voice of former Munsters actor Butch Patrick

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Tristan and Jules are happier than ever as the gang touch down on the coast of Thailand, but the shock news that Tristans ex Molly is there at the same time irks Jules. After a tricky break-up, Freddy and Beks find themselves on holiday together, but luckily for Beks, her ex Chuggs is there too. Back in London, Jack and Livvy both admit that their relationship has hit a rough patch

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Mariah Careys Magical Christmas Special, Im a Celebrity Get Me Out of Here!, Coronation Street, Swamp People: Serpent Invasion, Nigellas Cook, Eat, Repeat, Tiny World, news coverage of the Brexit stalemate and the Covid vaccine. They also comment on Health Secretary Matt Hancocks recent TV appearances

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: The Traitors 2023 finalist, Aaron, enters the restaurant looking for love and ends up paired with straight-A student Laura. Krissy returns to the dating scene for the first time after becoming a first-time mum at age 51 and ends up paired with chauffeur-to-the-stars, Rob. British Sign Language user Shaun is hoping his Mr Bean impression will impress party-loving Carly and Retail assistant Neil roller-skates into the restaurant looking for someone who accepts him just the way he is

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: Captain Kerry Titheradge takes control of the 197-foot motor yacht St David as he leads his crew off the rich, historical island of Grenada. As he steps onto St David for the first time, Captain Kerry relies on returning crew members, chief stew Fraser Olender and lead deckhand Ben Willoughby, to help the new staff find their way around the massive vessel. The conflict on the exterior looms large, while the heat in the galley is daunting. With new faces everywhere, romance is in the air, but will the challenges of a new crew and new roles prove too much for the St David?

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: An Academic Crime and a More Romantic Taco Bell
programme.desc: Dr Sturgis is furious when Sheldon accuses him of plagiarism. Mary sets out to find a suitable girl trophy for Missys end-of-season baseball ceremony, and Georgie has an awkward run-in with Veronica while on a date with new girlfriend Jana

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Couple Bruised Ribs and a Cereal Box Ghost Detector
programme.desc: George Sr accidentally puts the school librarian in hospital, so the Coopers nurse her back to health. Meemaw gives Georgie relationship advice

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Pritchett-Dunphy-Tuckers board the train for an eventful journey to Dedes wedding. Claire and Mitchell work on their speech, Phil and Cam are starstruck when they spot their favourite author on the train, Manny and Luke go girl crazy and Gloria finds herself stuck in a frustrating situation. Meanwhile, Jay seems delighted that Dede has moved on for good, but could his overenthusiasm come back to bite him?

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Peris heartbroken when an online call doesnt go to plan. Dillon is still struggling with conflicting emotions and Donny returns home to grovel to Misbah

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Leela worries about Ste when he doesnt come home, while Dillon jumps to conclusions. Elsewhere, Jez plans a memorial for Sienna

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos on the themes of food and animals

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. The restaurant was the shared dream of two newlyweds who have separated since its opening, and whose constant public quarrelling is distracting staff and driving customers away

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Homer Simpson, This Is Your Wife
programme.desc: In an episode written by Ricky Gervais, who provides the voice of a would-be ladies man, Homers obsession with Lennys new plasma TV leaves him desperate to buy one of his own, so he signs up for a wife-swapping show to win the money. Unfortunately, Marges new husband soon develops a crush on her

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns sends Homer to train new workers in India, where he is worshipped and granted control of the plant. Meanwhile, Patty and Selma kidnap McGyver star Richard Dean Anderson - who provides his own voice - from a Stargate SG-1 convention to teach him a lesson

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A House for Sale and Serious Woman Stuff
programme.desc: When Sheldon learns the house next door is for sale, the eccentric youngster takes it upon himself to find the perfect neighbours. Missy is left feeling torn when forced to pitch against her boyfriend at the baseball game. Comedy, starring Iain Armitage and Zoe Perry

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Baby Tooth and the Egyptian God of Knowledge
programme.desc: The eccentric youngster makes a scientific breakthrough at the dentists office. Dale and Meemaw go to the casino and Georgie makes a big mistake when he is left in charge of the store. Comedy, starring Iain Armitage

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Raj and Howard devise a contest to decide whether Sheldon or Kripke should get Professor Rothmans vacant corner office. Meanwhile, Penny receives the gift of a painting from Amy to celebrate their friendship, but discreetly tries to dispose of it with help from Bernadette

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon refuses to get his hair cut as his regular barber is in a coma - a solitary change that causes chaos in the rest of his well-ordered life. Meanwhile, Howard undergoes a gruelling Nasa training programme in Houston, Texas, meaning he can only communicate with Bernadette via the internet

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitchell manipulates Jay to make him think that an old friend might be gay when he notices several questionable signs. Meanwhile, Gloria gives Mannys date a makeover, and Claire wages war against Phils universal remote control. Guest starring Chazz Palminteri (Bullets Over Broadway)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire feels slightly inadequate when her old friend, Valerie visits and is nothing like Claire remembered. Jay has an unsettling locker room moment when he and Cameron play racquetball, and Mitchell tries to help Gloria with some legal problems. Guest starring Minnie Driver

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon hires an attractive female assistant, but when she becomes interested in Leonard, Penny decides to mark her territory by sleeping with him. Meanwhile, Howard starts to lose his mind when his return from space is delayed another week. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard returns from his space mission, but the welcome from his friends and family does not meet his expectations. His night alone with Bernadette goes badly, his mother ignores him, and he realises Stuart has taken his place as Rajs best friend. On top of that, Sheldon, Amy, Leonard and Penny kick him out of their group games night. Comedy, starring Simon Helberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Stuart hosts a Halloween party at the comic-book store, and Howard talks incessantly about his work on board the International Space Station, annoying his wife and friends. Penny and Leonard have a steamy encounter at the lab. Guest starring real-life astronaut Buzz Aldrin

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon upsets guest star Stephen Hawking when they play an online game of Words with Friends, until Howard advises him to let the scientist win. Elsewhere, Penny enrols in a college class, but decides to keep it a secret from Leonard. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: On Halloween, the squad members follow precinct tradition and pull out all the stops as they compete for the title of Ultimate Detective Slash Genius in the Halloween Heist. Peralta, Santiago and Holt are the determined competitors - but who will be crowned the reigning champion?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When Pimento and Diaz decide to tie the knot, the squad members try to prepare the perfect wedding under Santiagos careful direction. Peralta and Gina help Pimento to find his grandmothers ruby earrings so that Diaz can wear them at the ceremony. Jason Mantzoukas guest stars

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Homer and Lisa Exchange Cross Words
programme.desc: Lisa learns she is good at crossword puzzles and enters a city-wide contest. Homer opens a break-up service after discovering he has a flair for letting loved ones down, but gets himself into trouble with his daughter when he places a bet against her in the competition

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa takes a trip to the mall to buy a new gadget, while Bart manages to cause chaos. After making a hasty retreat, he befriends a boy named Bashir - but Homer begins to believe that his sons new pal is involved in a terrorist plot

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys invite the girls to a Dungeons and Dragons night when their trip to Vegas falls through after an incident with airport security. However, following a few drinks, Sheldon and Amys relationship takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Raj goes on a date with Lucy, who tries to sneak out of the restaurants bathroom window - but ends up getting stuck and calling for his help

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity, but it will mean he has to leave the country for several months. Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raja pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny bond as they miss Leonard, and Howard tries to help Raj get over his break-up with Lucy. Meanwhile, Bernadette and Amy visit an out-of-town biology convention. Comedy about four high-achieving scientists, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard returns from his research expedition in the North Sea and undergoes an adjustment period with Sheldon. Howard experiences an unusual emotional reaction as a result of his relationship with his mother. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A corporation buys Springfield Elementary School so it can secretly use the pupils as guinea pigs to test a new range of toys - but Lisa is not fooled and sets out to stop the businessmen. With the guest voices of Tim Robbins, Joe Mantegna and Gary Coleman

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge breaks her leg in a skiing accident and has to recover in hospital - so Lisa volunteers to take over as head of the household until she is well again. Unfortunately, Bart and Homer prove so awkward and unhelpful that she is driven to desperate measures

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: There is a shocking discovery in a missing persons case, Tom helps Tony to adapt to prison life, and a resident gets backed into a corner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge, Bart and Lisa taste success in the world of food blogging as the Three Mouthketeers. They score a reservation at Springfields most exclusive restaurant, but a dream makes Marge reconsider inviting Homer. With the voices of chefs Anthony Bourdain (Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations), Mario Batali (Molto Mario) and Gordon Ramsay (Hells Kitchen)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Twenty one-year-old post-grad student Madeleine struggles to find guys who stimulate her mentally, and would love to meet a rugby boy whos marriage material. Shes paired with rugby-playing Tom Hardy impersonator Ewan. Returning to the restaurant after a problem first date is truck driver Paul. His date is 50-year-old fellow Geordie Tracey. Meanwhile, 35-year-old Sophie from York seeks a man who isnt going to mess her around

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Its a Sin, Ant and Decs Saturday Night Takeaway, Married at First Sight Australia, Snakes in the City, Surviving Death, This Morning and Gordon Ramsays Bank Balance. Plus, BBC news coverage of Boris Johnsons road map announcement concerning reducing the restrictions of lockdown

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson welcomes two more singletons to choose a date after seeing what their potential partners have to offer on a purely physical level. First up is 25-year-old Hope, a model from Birmingham. A huge wrestling fan, she is keen to find a man who can finally pin her down. She is followed by 28-year-old veterinary student Kurt, a real-life Dr Doolittle who can talk to the animals but gets tongue-tied speaking to women. Will Naked Attractions unique dating method help him overcome his shyness?

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Best friends Emma and Dani hope that going on a double date will double their chances of leaving with the one for them. Emma is matched with wildlife documentary filmmaker Joe while Dani is paired with construction worker Clinton but the girls start to wonder if they should swap partners. Factory worker Mark is hoping Venezuelan cleaner Aire will be his perfect salsa partner and DJ Mel goes on a date with fashion graduate Samira

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer wins a vintage motorcycle and forms his own gang - only to encounter trouble in the form of tough bikers the Hells Satans, who kidnap Marge. Featuring the voices of John Goodman and Henry Winkler

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: A clerk in a South Seas trading post is sacked after being accused of stealing. After faking his suicide, he reacquaints himself with the trading ship captain who befriended him as a 12-year-old boy. The seafarer agrees to help him regain his reputation, but his trust is soon exploited. Drama, starring Ralph Richardson and Trevor Howard

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: Notorious pirate Henry Morgan is made governor of Jamaica, and offers other buccaneers the choice of giving up their lawless ways or facing justice. Two rogues refuse to toe the line, so Morgans trusted ally James Waring is sent to track them down, but has other things on his mind - namely winning the daughter of the previous governor away from her duplicitous fiance. High-seas adventure, with Tyrone Power, Laird Cregar, George Sanders, Maureen OHara and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the American Civil War, two Confederate soldiers are offered a way out of jail. Their former comrades-in-arms are now a gang of bandits terrorising Arizona, and the two prisoners are sent to infiltrate the group and bring them to justice. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Buster Crabbe, Ben Cooper and Gloria Talbott

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: A woman raises her six-year-old daughter to believe that Santa Claus does not exist, but they both have a change of heart after meeting a department store Father Christmas who claims to be the man himself. When the kindly fellow is accused of being a charlatan, his new friends engage a lawyer to prove his true identity. Remake of the 1947 family drama, with Richard Attenborough, Elizabeth Perkins, Mara Wilson and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Fishermans Friends
programme.desc: A music executive heads out to a Cornish fishing village on a mission to recruit a group of 10 local fishermen into recording an album of sea shanties. He struggles to win over the unlikely boy band and their families, but begins to gain a new appreciation for their traditional values. Comedy, starring James Purefoy, Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton

programme.title: Memory
programme.desc: Veteran hitman Alex Lewis decides to retire as he confronts the symptoms of Alzheimers, which has already reduced his brother Bill to a catatonic state in a nursing home. He reluctantly accepts one final job, to kill a lawyer in possession of an incriminating flash drive - but finds the mission violates his code. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Guy Pearce and Monica Bellucci

programme.title: The Rhythm Section
programme.desc: After a tragic plane crash kills her family, Stephanie Patrick heads down a path of self-destruction When she discovers it wasnt an accident, Stephanie turns to a former CIA operative who can help her find the culprits. But her quest to uncover the truth soon turns into a full-blown quest for revenge as Patrick decides to punish those responsible. Drama, starring Blake Lively, Jude Law and Matilda Ziegler

programme.title: The Big Man
programme.desc: An out-of-work miner in a Scottish town ravaged by unemployment is forced to turn to illegal bare-knuckle boxing to make ends meet. However, he soon realises the fighting game is corrupt and linked to a conflict between rival Glasgow drug gangs. Drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ian Bannen, Joanne Whalley, Billy Connolly and Hugh Grant

programme.title: The Devil at 4 OClock
programme.desc: A priest is sent to a South Seas island to replace a drunken missionary, who has been relieved of his duties. Sharing his flight are three convicts being sent to work at a childrens leper hospital. The five men must work together to protect the young patients when a volcano erupts, leaving them stranded with no easy way out. Adventure, starring Spencer Tracy, Frank Sinatra and Kerwin Mathews

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain: Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpes eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain

programme.title: The Winslow Boy
programme.desc: The father of a Navy cadet accused of theft goes to great lengths to restore his sons tarnished reputation. Historical courtroom drama based on a play by Terence Rattigan, starring Robert Donat, Margaret Leighton, Cedric Hardwicke and Basil Radford.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain: Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpes eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: Residents of a Welsh mining community at the start of the 20th century struggle to come to terms with the decline in their traditional way of life. Oscar-winning drama, starring Walter Pidgeon, Maureen OHara, Donald Crisp and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: After being taunted by relatives who think they will never have kids, married couple Pete and Ellie Wagner consider the option of adopting a child. However, they get more than they bargained for when they take in a rebellious teen and her two siblings. Director Sean Anders comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg, Rose Byrne and Isabela Merced

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain: Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpes eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: Elizabeth I rises to the throne of a divided and troubled Britain, and the early years of her reign find her under pressure to marry and produce an heir - while enemies both overseas and within her own court plot to bring about her downfall. Shekhar Kapurs historical drama, starring Cate Blanchett, Geoffrey Rush, Christopher Eccleston and Joseph Fiennes

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane visits Los Angeles to see his family over the Christmas holiday. Stopping off at his wifes place of work, he realises armed men have taken over the building and are holding the corporations staff to ransom - and only he has the ability to fight back. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman and Bonnie Bedelia

programme.title: Meander
programme.desc: A woman finds herself locked in a series of strange tunnels full of deadly traps. She has no choice but to crawl into safe sections to survive. To know why shes there and how to get out, she will have to face the memories of her dead daughter. Horror, starring Gaia Weiss, Peter Franzen and Romane Libert. In French and English

programme.desc: When two giant monsters attack Crystal Cove, Mayor Jones asks Fred, Daphne, Velma and Shaggy to help him capture them. Scooby is hurt when he spots Shaggy canoodling with Velma

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth, but he learns that its about to be shut down because of a ghost

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The gang travels to Las Vegas to meet a teen pop singer. They end up trying to uncover the mystery of a deceased magician

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: Peebles Pet Shop of Terrible Terrors!
programme.desc: Scooby and the Mystery Inc. gang meet Wanda Sykes, who is helping save a bunch of cute, fuzzy animals up for adoption

programme.title: Dinner Date
programme.desc: Matchmaking show in which people hope to connect through their love of food. In this episode, John chooses three blind dates from a selection of five potential partners, based entirely on menus they have created

programme.title: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programme.desc: The couple give Nelly the surprise of her life, baby Margot makes her first magazine cover, and Billie gives mum Sue a confidence boost with a surprise gift

programme.title: The Only Way Is Essex
programme.sub-title: Live: The Only Way Is Essex
programme.desc: The first-ever live edition of the reality programme following a group of people in Essex

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Potomac
programme.desc: Wendys husband Eddie throws a launch party for his new business, but several long-running feuds threaten to disrupt the festivities

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: A bar bike crawl and hot chicken contest start off the groups last day in Nashville. Joe Gorga questions Luis past, and Margaret and Teresa face off

programme.title: Buying the View
programme.desc: Richards dream property has to be on a certain street on the West Side of Manhattan and has to have a view of the Hudson River.

programme.title: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programme.desc: After dealing with a hectic few months, the family decide to jet off to their favourite place in the world, the Maldives

programme.title: The Only Way Is Essex
programme.desc: A special episode marking the shows tenth anniversary, which sees the return of some familiar faces, as the Essex favourites take a trip down memory lane

programme.title: The Bachelor Australia
programme.desc: The final single dates see the Bachelors ask the questions that they need answered before they commit to their girls in the finale.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Potomac
programme.desc: Ashley comes clean about her divorce, Nneka and Wendy meet in hopes of making peace, and the group head to the Dominican Republic

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: Dolores and Jennifer go head-to-head. A rift forms between the Gorga and the Giudice families because of Melissas feelings over not being asked to be Teresas bridesmaid

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as contestants Nikki Fox, Robert Rinder and Georgia Taylor see it and say it as they try to guess the familiar phrases hidden in animated clues. After the first elimination, the two remaining players battle to reach the Super Catchphrase round, where one of them could win £50,000 for the charity of their choice

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Strictly Come Dancings Motsi Mabuse and her sister, Dancing on Ices Oti, join forces to take on the banker and win money for charity. Supported by their friends, family and a few famous faces, can Motsi and Oti choose the right boxes and resist the bankers tempting cash offers until just the right moment in order to take home a fortune for their chosen charity?

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Quiz game show hosted by Lee Mack in which the questions have nothing to do with remembering facts, but are all about logic and common sense. A hundred contestants begin every show, but who will make it to the end and answer a question only one per cent of the country can get right - and win up to £100,000?

programme.title: Olivia Attwoods Bad Boyfriends
programme.desc: Olivias first relationship challenge forces the boys to face clips from the night out that they wish had stayed buried - any wrong answers unlock late-night lapses

programme.title: Sam and Billie: Sister Act
programme.desc: Sam has a work crisis, Billie finally gets a health diagnosis, the sisters go off grid and reveal the extent of some childhood traumas, and Sue gets a makeover.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffins fall victim to Italys immigration laws after Peter destroys the familys passports during a visit to the country. With the voices of Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein and Seth Green

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Chris goes to Canada with Peter to prove that his girlfriend exists, and Lois and Meg fight each other for the attention of a handsome handyman

programme.title: American Dad!

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Roger breaks up Steves friendship with Snot, Barry and Toshi. Jeff realises he has a flair for house flipping and gets Stan, Francine and Hayley involved

programme.title: Bobs Burgers
